caption.p: Historic averages (solid points) and projected values of air temperature (Â°C) for ( a, b) Praia do Forte, Bahia, ( c, d) Itaunas, Espirito Santo, ( e, f) and Maria Rosa, Rio de Janeiro under the extreme ( b, d, f) CMIP5 RCP8.5 scenario and the more conservative ( a, c, e) CMIP5 RCP4.5 scenario. Espirito Santo and Rio de Janeiro have fewer months shown to reflect their shorter nesting seasons compared to Bahia.
